ta̍k-ke lâi phò-tāu
phah-ka-la̍uh ê tāu-ngeh
tsok-tsiá: Lîm Kuì-hiong
Bí-li̍k ê uē-tsok " si̍p suī " ū tuì thóo-tē iúnn-tshī jîn-luī ê kám-un,
ū kan-khóo-lâng kian-kiông ê ì-tsì,
ū hōo-siong hun-hióng ê jîn-tsîng-bī.
bô-lūn siánn-mih bîn-tso̍k, bô-lūn siánn-mih sî-tāi,
lóng ē siū-tio̍h tsit khuán ko-sióng ê phín-tik,
bí-lē ê uē-bīn tshim-tshim kám-tōng.
sik-sî lán tsóo-sian khò siang-tshiú phah-piànn,
pha-hng ê thóo-tē bô sù-sī ê tsuí-lōo thang iōng,
sàn-tshiah ê î-bîn bô tsînn bué lông-kū bué puî,
tsí-ū khò siang-tshiú phah-piànn.
sing-sán--tshut-lâi ê ngóo-kok iú-hān;
tshinn tsia̍h to bô-kàu, ná ū thang pha̍k-kuann?
ta̍k-ke lóng tsin pó-sioh, m̄-kánn thó-tsè,
mi̍h-kiānn kan-na ū khioh--tńg-lâi--ê,
bô thang tàn-tiāu.
ti̍k-pia̍t sī ē-tàng "tsia̍h" ê mi̍h-kiānn,
tiānn-tio̍h bē-tàng phah-sńg.
tuì ka-tī khiām-tn̂g-neh-tōo,
m̄-koh tsóng-sī ē siūnn-tio̍h su-iàu pang-tsōo--ê ê lâng,
siu-sîng liáu-āu ū phah-ka-la̍uh--ê,
to̍h pun hōo ta̍k-ke khì khioh-si̍p,
ū-sî tsng-á-lāi ū khah khùn-khóo ê lâng,
tio̍h-ài khò án-ne tōo-ji̍t,
hn̂g-tsú mā  hó-sim phah khah lī--leh,
lâu khah tsē--leh pang-tsōo--in.
hiān-tsú-sî, siā-huē phóo-phiàn lóng tsin hù-jū,
tsin tsió lâng bat thé-huē iau-gō ê kan-khóo,
tian-tò sī kiann tsia̍h siunn-kuè tsuē siunn-kuè hó!
"sioh mi̍h" ê phín-tik tī tsit tāi lâng ê sin--siōng tsiām-tsiām siau-sit,
tuì lâng hun-hióng kah kuan-huâi ê sim-lí mā lú lâi lú po̍h.
kóo-tsá sî-tāi sàn-tshiah ê tsóo-sian ū siōng ko-sióng ê phín-tik;
tuì-thāi thóo-tē sī tsun-tiōng kah kám-siā,
tuì-thāi lâng ē tsiong-sim-pí-sim, bē tsū-su-tsū-lī.
tsit khuán sio-lō-sio-lō ê jîn-tsîng-bī iá-ū tó tshuē!
ta̍k-nî tsa̍p-it--gue̍h, tī Ko Pîn tē-khu,
môo-tāu m̄-nā sī nî guā-siau tsa̍p-káu-ik ê li̍k-kim,
mā sī tsin tsuē lâng hiáng-siū hong-siu ê un-tián.
iōng ke-khì siu-sîng liáu-āu,
khui-hòng hōo ta̍k-ke khì khioh phah-ka-la̍uh ê tāu-ngeh.
hn̂g-tsú koh ē iōng môo-tāu buâ hó lim ê tāu-ling,
tsò kiān-khong kán-tan ê liāu-lí khuán-thāi ta̍k-ke;
bô su-iàu iā-tsíng,
bô su-iàu tsìng-tsoh to̍h ē-tàng ū hong-siu ê huann-hí,
tuā-lâng gín-á tsuè-tīn, tshù-pinn-thâu-bué sio-tsio,
ná tshuē ná tshit-thô,
lāu-jia̍t-kún-kún ê tshân-hn̂g,
ta̍k-ke lo̍k-thiòng hiáng-siū.
nā-sī ū ki-huē,
lí it-tīng ài tsham-ka môo-tāu ka-liân-huâ-huē,
tsit khuán ê bû-su hōo lâng siūnn-beh hó-khang tàu sio-pò,
ná khioh koh ē ná siūnn: beh hun hōo siánn-mih-lâng?
tshin-tsiânn-gōo-tsa̍p, ta̍k-ke ū lâng ū hūn,
lú khioh lú tsuē lóng m̄ tsai thiám.
liáu-āu lí tiānn-tio̍h tsiām-tsiām-á thé-huē hit tsiòng kóo-ì,
sim-lāi ê hīng-hok mā ta̍uh-ta̍uh-á pok-ínn.
tsìng tsi̍t lia̍p hi tin-sioh ê tsíng-tsí, tē-kiû ē lú lâi lú suí,
tsìng tsi̍t lia̍p hun-hióng ê tsíng-tsí, jîn-tsîng ē lú lâi lú tinn.
ta̍k-ke tsò-hué lâi iā-tsíng,
tsiong tuì thóo-tē ê thiànn-sim senn-thuànn--tshut-khì,
tsiong tuì jîn-luī ê kuan-sim hòng-sàng--tshut-khì.
m̄-nā ka-tī ū lú lâi lú tsuē hong-siu ê ki-huē,
mā khuànn ē tio̍h ta̍k-ke khuài-lo̍k ê tshiò-iông,
lán ê sènn-miā tik-khak ē sîng-tsiū tsi̍t pak siōng suí ê uē,
sī tsi̍t pak kám-tōng ka-tī, kám-tōng pa̍t-lâng ê uē.
tsok-tsiá: Tsan Kang-san
ah, thâu-tsîng m̄ tsai koh that guā-tn̂g?
tshuā tsi̍t tsiah oo-niau, khiâ sàu-se pue, tsin tshut-miâ ê a-kî:
tn̂g bē kuè lí thâu-khak-lāi khuànn bē thàu--ê,
hia--ê kip beh ài ê ǹg-bāng!
guā-kháu piān-nā that-tshia,
tsi̍t-kuá lâng ê thâu-khak-lāi,
to̍h khai-sí leh oo-pe̍h siūnn--ah.
tsit-sî nā-sī ū tshiūnn ang-á-tsheh ê tshia-lián-á,
ē-tàng kuân--khí-lâi,
lâi kā hānn--kuè,
beh juā-hó--leh!
tsiàm khuân ê sìng iah-koh m̄ kái,
tàu lak-tsǹg, pa̍t-lâng ê tshia-kha bóng nǹg.
iah-koh beh that juā-kú?
a-kî bô kòo--leh ē kā pa̍t-lâng hánn tio̍h-kiann,
tshíng-ing-ia-ki khiâ--leh,
tuì tshia-thang-á-guā pue--tshut-khì!
i ná tī thinn-tíng pue,
hit ki tshíng-ing-ia suh-kóng-á,
ná kā kui-lōo tsìng-lâng ê guān-bōng,
kah ian-tâng-kóng oo-ian lóng siu--ji̍p-khì!
tsiah-koh uì tshia-thang pue--ji̍p-lâi.
tshia hiông-hiông suah thong--ah!
a-kî, lí kái-tôo--ah,
khiâ mi̍h-kiānn ê kang-hu koh tsìn-pōo--ah,
liân khiâ leh pue ê ke-si-thâu-á mā kái--ah?
tsū tíng-kái tī hit tsiah khong-khì-tsûn ē-kha,
bô tsah sàu-se,
lîm-sî kā lâng tsioh khiâ hit ki thôo-kha lù-á,
kiù ba̍k-kiànn--ê liáu-āu bô-juā-kú,
to̍h khai-sí uānn khiâ tsit tsiah, tshing pùn-sò--ê.
tsin gâu tuè sî-kiânn,
lí hit tsiah oo-niau--leh?
thuân kàu tē la̍k jī-tsa̍p-la̍k tāi,
khai-sí leh tsò guān-bōng kah khong-khì hun-sik ê khang-khuè.
ah! hun-sik hó--ah! tú thuân--lâi.
a-kî kā sòo-jī phah li̍p-khì tsi̍t tâi tsin kuài-kî ê tiān-náu
guān-bōng mā ē pàng-to̍k--ooh?
ē. tsia--ê, thâu tú-tsiah siu--ji̍p-lâi ê guān-bōng
hōo lí suh--tsi̍t-tshuì-á, lí to̍h tsai.
guá suh tsi̍t tshuì liáu-āu, koh thòo tsi̍t-ē-á khuì
ìn-sióng sióng tshim ê sī...
ū bū tshut thang se̍h tē-kiû sann-tsa̍p liàn ê gûn-phiò,
kah kui-lōo － sán kah phuê pau kut,
kian-sim gîn-phiò tiám suah, tsiah kam-guān hioh-khùn ê hó-gia̍h-lâng.
ū siann ê àm-mî
tsok-tsiá: Nâ Tshun-suī
tsè-tsâi-sóo ê tshù-kuà,
nā m̄ sī khàm tsi̍t lîng tsi̍t lîng ê a-iân-phìnn
to̍h sī kui niá oo-oo ê tiám-má-ka tsuá,
tú-tio̍h sia̍p tuā-hōo ê lâu-pái,
tsi̍t tsūn tsi̍t tsūn sà-sà-kiò
bē-su tī tiánn-té leh tshá thôo-tāu hiah lāu-jia̍t,
suà--lo̍h-khì kui-káng sūn nî-tsînn-kha ê tsuí-khiò,
lâu uì tshù-kak-thâu--khì,
koh tshin-tshiūnn tsuí-tshiâng án-ne,
uì tíng-kuân piànn lo̍h-khì tshù-āu-kau,
hōo lú tshoo tshuah lâu-siann lú tân,
kánn-ná khe-tsuí leh tshiâng tsio̍h-piah,
sé iù-sua án-ne hi-hi-hua-hua ū tshoo ū iù,
liâm-mi kuân liâm-mi kē,
hó-tshin-tshiūnn ū lâng tsē tī tshù-bué-tíng leh e tiàu-kuí-á,
tsi̍t-khùn-á khan tn̂g-siann leh hainn-khí-hainn-lo̍h,
koh tsi̍t-khùn-á suah tńg-kuân-se̍h-kē leh onn-onn-kiò,
hó-thiann koh bē tshá lâng ê bîn,
hōo lâng khùn kah lóng m̄ tsai thang tsing-sîn.
tse sī tuà kang-liâu ê sàn-tshiah-kiánn,
tsiah ū hit-lō hok-khì,
ah nā hó-gia̍h-lâng kiann khì hōo hong-hōo tshá--tio̍h,
kuinn mn̂g tshuànn hōo bih tī lâu-á-tshù ê pâng-king-á-té,
khah ū tsit-lō sin-miā thang thiann--leh?
kui-pâi khí tī thih-ki-lōo-pinn hōo kang-lâng khùn ê kang-liâu,
mê--sî thiann ē tio̍h kui-lia̍t sūn thih-ki-lōo sái--kuè ê tshia-tsuā,
khan tn̂g-siann lòng-lòng-háu,
kàu-tsām ta̍h tòng-á si-si-kiò,
ûn-ûn-á suan ji̍p-lâi hīnn-khang lāi-té,
kiàn-nā tó tī tsóng-phoo ê bîn-tshn̂g-tíng,
ē sing kám-ìng tio̍h thôo-kha sió-khuá leh tsùn,
uì hn̄g-hn̄g thih-ki-lōo hit pîng-thâu ûn-liâu-á tsǹg li̍p-lâi sin-khu,
Thê-sī-khah pian-hō :TS_0033
suà-lo̍h-lâi khuànn tâi lâm tshī miâ-á-tsài sann tsa̍p it hō ê thinn-khì
un-tōo lī tsa̍p it tsì lī tsa̍p la̍k tōo, lo̍h-hōo ki-lu̍t la̍k tsa̍p %
lâi-pin tsi̍t pah sì tsa̍p gōo hō tshiánn-lâi lī tsa̍p hō kuī-tâi pān-lí
lóng-tsóng  peh tsa̍p sì  khoo, tsāu lí tsa̍p la̍k khoo
kin-á-li̍t sī káu-gue̍h tshe-káu, pài-sann
guá ê hōo-tsiàu hō-bé sī lī sù lī sù peh gōo lī gōo sù
gún-tau ê tiān-uē hō-bé sī khòng ngóo kiú ngóo gōo gōo lio̍k tshit it
i-tī it kiú pat sù nî tshut-sì
tshiánn pang guá tsuán hun-ki káu khòng sù gōo
Lí kám beh uānn kuá  lân-san--ê, suànn-phiò kah gîn-kak-á ?
Hó, bô, hōo guá tsi̍t-khoo--ê pah-gōo, gōo-khoo--ê sann-á-gōo,
tsa̍p khoo--ê nn̄g-tshing-gōo, gōo-tsa̍p--ê nn̄g-tshing
pah-phiò gōo-tshing, gōo-pah--ê bān-gōo, tshun--ê lóng tshing-phiò.
Guá sió siá--tsi̍t-ē.
Lóo-la̍t--lí. Lín tsia ū tāi siu tiān-hué-tsînn--bô?
Lí kám ū gún tsia ê sìn-iōng-khah?
Ū ah!Tsuí-tō、gah-suh、tiān-uē-huì kap suè-kim lóng ē-sái tī tsia la̍p,
lí nā úi-thok--guán, āu-pái tiō lóng bián huân-ló bē-kì-lit la̍p.
Bē--lah, kan-na uí-thok-su 、 ài gún tāi-la̍p ê sū-hāng 、 khàu-tsînn ê kháu-tsō siá hó-sè
Tshiú-sio̍k ē tsiok mâ-huân--bē?
koh tǹg tsi̍t-ē ìn-á tiō hó--ah.
Guá āu-kái lâi tsiah pān.
Guán tng-leh thui-siau  Nn̄g-nî bián nî-hùi--ê .
Guá ū sin-tshíng--ah, to-siā.
Lí thâu-tsîng í-á sió tsē--tsi̍t--ē, hó, guá ē kā lí kiò.
Kah Tâi-bûn-sóo ê iok-huē
tsok-tsiá: Tân Lī-bûn
Sann gue̍h tsa̍p sì pe̍h-sik tsîng-jîn-tseh,
kin-á-li̍t guá beh iok-huē ê tuì-siōng tsiânn ti̍k-sû,
sī Ko-hiông Su-huān Tāi-ha̍k Tâi-uân li̍k-sú bûn-huà kah gí-giân gián-kiù-sóo ê kàu-siū,
tse sī guá bîn-bāng to siūnn-bē-kàu ê tāi-tsì,
lîn-sing ná bāng,
ē tsi̍t pōo beh tshut-hiān siánn-mih kiann-hí,
tsin-tsiànn hōo lâng liāu-sióng-bē-kàu.
kin-á-li̍t li̍t-thâu tsin un-liû,
sī iok-huē ê hó thinn-khì.
lâi kàu Ko-hiông Su-huān Tāi-ha̍k pò-tò tsún-pī biān-tshì,
tuì tsi̍t ê ta̋nn ta̍h-ji̍p Tâi-gú-kài koh bô kài si̍k-sāi Tâi-gú bûn-huà ê lâng lâi kóng,
guá tsin-tsiànn m̄ tsai beh tsún-pī siánn-mih-khuán ê lāi-iông,
guá kuat-tīng tuà tsi̍t lia̍p lia̍t-sîng ê sim khì kìnn kàu-siū,
in-iân ê tāi-tsì tiō kau hōo thinn-kong-peh khì an-pâi.
Beh bīn-tshì tsìn-tsîng,
guá ū kam tsi̍t-kuá bô kāng tsoo ê tông-o̍h khai-káng,
in ta̍k-ke khuànn--khí-lâi tsū-sìn buán buán lóng tsin ū pá-ak ê khuán,
ná kóng ná liáu-kái in ê hun-hióng liáu-āu,
guá tsin-tsiànn kám-kak tī tsit ê líng-hi̍k guá ài ha̍k-si̍p--ê koh tsin tsē,
sim-lāi koh kā thinn-kong-peh--á kóng,
guá iōng pîng-siông-sim lâi bīn-tuì tsit kài ê bīn-tshì,
ká-sú tse sī guá li̍t-āu beh kiânn ê lōo,
guá siong-sìn lí ē pang-tsān guá,
nā m̄ sī guá mā siong-sìn lí ē an-pâi guá kiânn tī siōng sik-ha̍p ê lōo-tíng,
it-tshè kau hōo lí an-pâi.
lûn-tio̍h guá beh li̍p-khì bīn-tshì--ah,
tsi̍t pōo tsi̍t pōo kiânn kàu beh biān-tshì ê khó-tiûnn,
guá tī sim-lāi tsò tsuè-āu tsi̍t tàu ê kî-tó,
kā ka-kī kóng sui-bóng tám-tám
tiō iōng tsin-sîng-sim, pîng-siông-sim bīn-tuì,
kin-á-li̍t bīn-tshì ê nn̄g uī kàu-siū lóng tsin tshin-tshiat,
biān-tshì ê kuè-tîng guá kám-kak ná tshin-tshiūnn teh khai-káng,
hōo guá tsi̍t lia̍p kín-tiunn ê sim má-siōng khin-sang bē tsió,
guá kán-tan pò-kò pò-khó Tâi-bûn-sóo ê guân-in,
kàu-siū khuànn-tio̍h guá ū bûn-tsiong tī "BONG-pò" khan-tshut,
tiō mn̄g guá lāu tshù ê bûn-tsiong tsit kù
"tsū guá lî-khui kàu-tann"
tsit lī "tann" nā-sī iōng Huâ-gí kái-seh,
guá ē án-ne kóng,
guá huê-tap tsit lī "tann" sī guá teh siá "lāu tshù" tsit phinn bûn-tsiong ê tong-sî
tsit-má hiān-tshú-sî ê su-liām.
Suà--lo̍h-lâi kàu-siū koh khuànn-tio̍h guá līng-guā tsi̍t phinn ha̍k-si̍p sim-tik,
i tsin hònn-kî guá án-tsuánn iōng tshiú-ki-á o̍h Tâi-gí,
guá īng té-té kuí hun-tsing kah kàu-siū hun-hióng tsit-má kho-ki huat-ta̍t,
lī-iōng bāng-lōo o̍h bú-gí tsin hong-piān,
suî-sî ē-tàng tshâ Tâi-gí-bûn mā ē-tàng thiann huat-im,
tshiú-ki-á phah Lô-má-lī mā lóng bô būn-tê,
siōng sù-sī--ê sī Line ē-tàng thuân siann-im tóng-àn,
m̄-kuán siánn-mih sî-tsūn tú-tio̍h būn-tê
iah-sī bē-hiáu ê huat-im lóng ū-huat-tōo kái-kuat lân-tê,
tsin tsiànn-sī tsi̍t ê tī sin-khu-pinn ê bān-lîng lāu-su.
Hōo guá ìn-siōng siōng tshim--ê sī kàu-siū mn̄g guá:
"ū tha̍k-tsheh kah tha̍k-ū tsheh,
guá ū siánn-mih khuànn-huat."
tuì guá lâi kóng tsit nn̄g ê khu-pia̍t,
thâu-tsîng tsit ê sī "miâ-sû"
āu-piah hit ê sī "tōng-sû".
guá huê-tap kàu-siū guá tsin tsē tông-o̍h sui-bóng lóng ū tha̍k-tsheh,
m̄-koh siōng-khò ê sî-tsūn m̄ sī teh khuànn iPad,
bīn-tshì tsa̍p hun-tsing su̍t--tsi̍t-ē tiō kàu--ah,
án-ne mā sī "ū tha̍k-tsheh",
lī-khui khó-tiûnn ê sî-tsūn guá tsin muá-ì ka-kī tsin-sîng ê thāi-tōo kah pîng-ún ê piáu-hiān.
Tī khai-káng ê khì-hun lāi-té,
án-ne tsiah-sī "tha̍k-ū tsheh".
tān-sī guá tuì "tha̍k-ū tsheh" ê khuànn-huat,
sī guá tī siūnn-beh o̍h ê líng-i̍k o̍h-tio̍h siūnn-beh o̍h ê mi̍h-kiānn,
bô, tiō sī teh sńg tshiú-ki-á,
kám-siā nn̄g uī kàu-siū thê-tshut ê būn-tê,
tsuè-kīn kuí nî,
guá in-uī ha̍k-si̍p ê kuè-tîng ū bô kâng-khuán ê tsìn-pōo kah sîng-tióng,
put-kuán Ko-su-tāi Tâi-bûn-sóo si̍k-sū-pan tsuè-āu ū tiâu--bô,
hōo guá tuì tsiông-lâi m̄ bat siūnn--kuè ê mn̄g-tê ū su-khó kah piáu-ta̍t ê ki-huē.
lóng kám-siā sîn kā guá iōng-sim an-pâi kah pang-tsān,
hōo guá thé-giām tsin bô kâng-khuán ê kuè-tîng,
tsit ê pó-kuì ê king-giām koh tsi̍t pái hong-hù guá ê sìnn-miā.
"khì Tiong-kok-huà" ê khai-san-tsóo — — Tiong-kok!
tsok-tsiá: Tiunn Ho̍k-tsū
tiān-sī pò-tsuá tsin tsia̍p khuànn-tio̍h "khì Tiong-kok-huà " tsit ê miâ-sû.
Khah ti̍k-pia̍t--ê sī,
tsit ê sû sī "Tiong-kok Kok-bîn-tóng" the̍h-lâi mē Tâi-uân-lâng kah Bîn-tsìn-tóng tsìng-hú ê "tsuan-iú miâ-sû".
kiàn-pái nā ū "hiān-tāi-huà" kah "tsāi-tē-huà" ê siūnn-huat á-sī tsìng-tshik thê-tshut,
"Tiong-kok Kok-bîn-tóng" it-tīng the̍h tsit ê sû tshut-lâi huán-tuì,
koh kám-kak tsin ū-lōo-iōng ê khuán.
Tuì pún-thóo gú-giân kà-ha̍k khai-sí,
it-ti̍t kàu thê-sing kok-tsè kīng-tsing-li̍k ê Lô-má-lī kàu-io̍k lóng-tsóng kāng-khuán.
Lán bat tsú-tiunn ha̍k-hāu tû-liáu ㄅㄆㄇ kàu-ha̍k í-guā,
koh tsá-li̍t khai-sí kà Lô-má-lī abc,
siōng-hó sī pí-tsiàu Huâ-gí kàu-io̍k ㄅㄆㄇ ê "siú-tsheh",
mā pian-siá pún-thóo gí-giân "siú-tsheh".
Lô-má-lī sing kà tsa̍p lé-pài,
thê-sing bú-gí kàu-ha̍k hāu-kó,
koh hong-piān Tâi-uân gín-á āu-pái khì sè-kài thang iōng Lô-má-lī o̍h pa̍t tsióng gí-giân,
pang-tsān piànn king-tsè.
Án-ne kám mā sǹg-sī "khì Tiong-kok-huà"?
khó-pí kóng:
hiān-tāi siā-huē put-kuán sī bîn-kan, kuann-hong, kho-ha̍k, bûn-ha̍k, i-ha̍k, tiat-ha̍k ê bûn-su
tiānn-tio̍h lóng sī iōng "pe̍h-uē-bûn" lâi siá,
bô lâng koh teh iōng kóo-tsá ê "sí gí-bûn" ( bûn-giân-bûn ).
Sóo-pái ta̍k-ke kiàn-gī ha̍k-hāu gú-bûn khò ing-kai tsīn-liōng kà khah tsē pe̍h-uē-bûn,
tse-sī hiān-tāi bûn-bîng ê ki-tshóo.
M̄ kú "Tiong-kok Kok-bîn-tóng" suî tāi-sing khiā tshut-lâi huán-tuì,
kóng he sī "khì Tiong-kok-huà".
sū-si̍t sī it kiú it kiú nî Tiong-kok Gōo-sù-ūn-tōng ê sî,
Tiong-kok ha̍k-tsiá Tshî Tsì-môo, Ôo Sik, Tân To̍k-siù tíng tiō ū án-ne ê tsú-tiunn.
Tsia-ê lâng lóng sī kia̍t-tshut, ū uán-kiàn ê Tiong-kok gâu-lâng,
tian-tò kin-á-li̍t tī Tâi-uân hia-ê tsú-tiunn bûn-giân-bûn ê ha̍k-tsiá, tsok-ka, muî-thé
pún-sin mā bô koh iōng bûn-giân-bûn kóng-uē, siá-tsok, pò sin-bûn.
Koh ū, tsiànn-káng ê "Tiong-kok" í-king kā huân-thé hàn-lī huì-tiāu,
kái-iōng kán-thé hàn-lī.
Tse mā sī Lóo Sìn ê tsú-tiunn:
"hàn-lī bô bia̍t, Tiong-kok pit bông".
in-uī hàn-lī pháinn o̍h, pháinn siá, pháinn kì, pháinn līn.
Beh iōng tsit khuán bûn-lī lâi jīn-bat bûn-bîng,
tui-kiû tì-sik kah tshòng-tsō sin bûn-bîng kah bûn-huà sī tsiok khùn-lân ê tāi-tsì.
Tiong-huâ-bîn-kok tī Tiong-kok tsè-tīng ê ㄅㄆㄇ,
tsiànn-káng ê "Tiong-kok" tsit-má pīng bô tshái-iōng,
tian-tò sī suán-iōng abc hû-hō ê "hàn-gí phing-im".
Tse tong-liân mā sī "khì Tiong-kok-huà",
m̄ kú án-ne tsiah sī tsìng-khak ê suán-ti̍k.
kiat-lūn: "khì Tiong-kok-huà" sī Tiong-kok-lâng tshuā-thâu khai-sí--ê,
mā sī tsìng-khak--ê!
Lán ing-kai tuā-la̍t, khuài-sok koh ū hāu-lu̍t tshui-sak "khì Tiong-kok-huà"!
liû-kám kuì-tseh
tsok-tsiá: Khu Tan-nî
tsuè-kīn thinn-khì lú lâi lú líng--ah,
ta̍k-nî kuânn-thinn sī liû-hîng-sìng kám-mōo liû-hîng ê kuì-tseh,
kán-tshing "liû-kám".
kin-nî tsa̍p gue̍h khai-sí tsù liû-kám i̍k-biâu,
guá kám ū su-iàu tsù?
liû-kám i̍k-biâu tàu-té sī siánn-mih--leh?
ta̍k-nî sè-kài uē-sing tsoo-tsit WHO lóng ē ī-tshik āu tsi̍t nî khó-lîng tsō-sîng liû-hîng ê liû-kám pēnn-to̍k,
pí-lūn kóng tsit kái WHO ī-tshik lī khòng it pat kàu lī khòng it kiú nî ê liû-kám pēnn-to̍k ū
H1N1, H3N2, Colorado tsit kuí tsióng,
tsit ê sî-tsūn WHO ē kā pēnn-to̍k siong-kuan ê tsu-liāu thê-kiong hōo io̍h-tshiúnn,
tshiánn io̍h-tshiúnn phuè-ha̍p lâi tsè-tsok liû-kám i̍k-biâu.
tsù liû-kám i̍k-biâu tû-liáu pó-hōo ka-kī í-guā,
tiōng-tiám sī beh pó-hōo liû-kám ko hong-hiám ê tso̍k-kûn,
tshin-tshiūnn âng-enn-á, gín-á-lâng, lāu-lâng tíng-tíng.
lâi! tsiò--kuè-lâi tsiò--kuè-lâi!
lâi khuànn tsìng-hú hōo lán ê hok-lī,
kin-nî hû-ha̍p tsù kong-huì i̍k-biâu tsu-keh ê lâng ū:
la̍k kò gue̍h kàu tsa̍p-peh huè, gōo-tsa̍p huè í-siōng,
ū-sin kah sing-sán liáu la̍k kò gue̍h í-lāi ê hū-jîn-lâng,
âng-enn-á ê pē-bó, iù-jî-hn̂g tsiàu-kòo gín-á ê jîn-uân,
ko hong-hiám bān-sìng pēnn-huān, i-liâu lîn-uân tíng-tíng.
kóng kàu tsia,
kàu-té guá kám ū su-iàu tsù liû-kám i̍k-biâu--leh?
nā-sī hû-ha̍p kong-huì i̍k-biâu tiâu-kiānn ê ko hong-hiám tso̍k-kûn sī kiàn-gī ài tsù.
ta̍k-ke kám tsai-iánn?
tsit kuí nî in-uī liû-kám sí-bông ê lâng tsha-put-to lóng sī bô tsù i̍k-biâu ê ko hong-hiám tso̍k-kûn,
iû-kî sī gín-á-lâng kah lāu-lâng,
sóo-í tsìng-hú ē tīng tsit ê kong-huì ê tsìng-tshik sī tsiânn ū tō-lí--ê,
bo̍k-ti̍k tiō sī hi-bāng tsit-khuán ê pi-kio̍k ē-tàng lú lâi lú tsió.
ū tsi̍t-kuá lâng ē kóng: "guá kám-kak tsù i̍k-biâu kin-pún tiō bô-hāu,
guá kū-nî ū tsù,
kin-nî iáu-sī tio̍h-tshìng--ah!"
thong-siông tsit-khuán tsōng-hóng ū nn̄g tsióng guân-in:
tē-it, WHO ê ī-tshik bô tsún,
sóo-í kám-kak bô-hāu,
m̄-kò tsit-khuán tsîng-hîng khah tsió.
lî-tshiánn tiō sǹg ī-tshik bô tsún,
i̍k-biâu iáu-sī ē ū pó-hōo ê tsok-iōng,
kiám-khin kám-liám ê tsìng-tsiōng;
tē-lī, kî-si̍t lí sī it-puann ê kám-mōo,
m̄ sī liû-kám.
liû-kám i̍k-biâu sī tsiam-tuì liû-kám pēnn-to̍k ê i̍k-biâu,
tuì it-puann ê kám-mōo bô-hāu.
tsin tsē lâng lóng kiò-sī kóng liû-kám kah it-puann ê kám-mōo tsha-put-to,
suah khì tshiân-tio̍h tī-liâu ê sî-kan.
ài tsù-ì!
kî-si̍t liû-kám kah it-puann ê kám-mōo sī bô kâng-khuán--ê őo!
liû-kám ē thâu-khak thiànn, kui sin-khu sng-thiànn,
tiōng-tiám sī ē huat-sio,
sio bē thè,
tse kah it-puann kám-mōo ê giâm-tiōng thîng-tōo bô kâng őo!
iáu-koh ū tsi̍t khuán tsîng-hîng,
tiō sī WHO ī-tshik liáu ū tsún,
lî-tshiánn lí mā ū-iánn tio̍h-tio̍h liû-kám,
ah m̄-tiō hó-lit-ka-tsài ū tsù i̍k-biâu,
ia̍h-bô tsin-tsiànn sī ē kan-khóo kah buē-hiáu kóng--ooh!
sóo-í, nā-sī hû-ha̍p kong-huì tsu-keh ê ko hong-hiám tso̍k-kûn,
kiàn-gī tio̍h-ài tsù liû-kám i̍k-biâu.
lí nā-sī bô hû-ha̍p kong-huì tsu-keh,
tsa̍p-peh kàu sì-tsa̍p-káu huè ê kiān-khong siàu-liân-lâng,
tiō ē-sái tsū-iû suán-ti̍k,
beh tsū-huì tsù liû-kám i̍k-biâu ia̍h-sī bô-ài tsù.
siōng tiōng-iàu--ê sī ài khah tsia̍p sé-tshiú,
liû-kám liû-hîng ê kî-kan khah mài khì lâng kheh lâng ê sóo-tsāi,
tshù-lāi pó-tshî khong-khì liû-thong,
îng-ióng ài ū-kàu, khah tsia̍p ūn-tōng,
hi-bāng kin-nî ê kuânn-thinn ta̍k-ke lóng kiān-khong őo!
Tâi-tsik-tiān sin tshiúnn lâu Tâi-uân, huat-tiān khióng-kiann tsin tsia̍h-la̍t
tsok-tsiá: Luā Tsiau-lâm
Tâi-uân peh gue̍h tiong tsuân Tâi tuā sit-tiān,
bat thuân kóng Tâi-tsik-tiān tîng koh khó-lū,
beh kā sin ê ko ki-su̍t sann nāi-bí kang-tshiúnn kái khì khí tī Bí-kok,
hōo kui-ê puànn-tō-thé sán-gia̍p-liān tuā tē-tāng.
kàu kah káu gue̍h  lī káu,
Tâi-tsik-tiān tsiah suan-pòo,
sann nāi-bí sin tshiúnn khak-tīng lâu tiàm Tâi-uân,
beh khí tī Lâm-kho Tâi-lâm uân-khu.
kin-kì sán-gia̍p-liān tsa̍p gue̍h tshe ê thui-sǹg,
tse thang siânn-lâi tshit tshing gōo pah ik Tâi-phiò ê tâu-tsu;
mā ū hun-sik huân-ló,
bī-lâi beh huat-tiān hōo Tâi-tsik-tiān,
khióng-kiann-á tsin tsia̍h-la̍t.
Tī tsing-uân tāi-kang tshī-tiûnn tshuā-thâu ê Tâi-tsik-tiān lī káu piáu-sī,
king-kuè tsim-tsiok phah-sǹg liáu-āu,
beh hē gōo tshing ik tāng-pún lâi khí ê ko ki-su̍t sann nāi-bí sin tshiúnn,
khak-tīng beh khí tī Lâm-kho Tâi-lâm uân-khu;
Tâi-tsik-tiān tī hia ū tsê-tsuân ê tsng-siā kah kiong-ìng-liān,
ē-tàng kè-sio̍k tsiàm iânn-bīn.
khí kang-tshiúnn ê thóo-tē, tsuí-tiān, huân-pó tíng siong-kuan gī-tê,
tsìng-hú lóng pau-niá ē kā kái-kuat,
Tâi-tsik-tiān piáu-sī tsin to-siā,
sann nāi-bí sin tshiónn tiānn-tio̍h ē lâu tiàm Tâi-uân.
tsuân sè-kài tsing-uân tāi-kang tshī-tiûnn ū la̍k pah ik bí-kim ê sing-sán kè-ta̍t,
Tâi-tsik-tiān tō koo-tsiàm tshiau-kuè tsi̍t-puànn,
kàu kah gōo tsa̍p tiám la̍k pha,
suà--lâi tē-jī--ê sī Bí-kok ê Global Foundries,
tsiah kan-na tsiàm káu tiám la̍k pha;
ki-su̍t siōng,
Tâi-tsik-tiān thang kah Intel, sam-sing tán puànn-tō-thé tuā kong-si pí-phīng;
phe-bôo siōng,
Tâi-tsik-tiān tshī-tiûnn kè-ta̍t ū gōo tiám la̍k lī tiāu Tâi-phiò.
khó-kiàn Tâi-tsik-tiān tuì Tâi-uân kho-ki sán-gia̍p, tsu-pún tshī-tiûnn ê iàu-kín,
nā-sī ko ki-su̍t, sin tshiónn suá kàu kok-guā,
tuì kui-ê Tâi-uân ê sán-gia̍p, king-tsè,
sīm-tsì siā-huē, tsìng-tī lóng ū íng-hióng.
sui-bóng lōo-bué Tâi-tsik-tiān khak-tīng sin tshiónn lâu tiàm Tâi-uân,
m̄-koh ū hun-sik tsí-tshut,
suà-lo̍h-lâi khuànn phênn-ôo-kuān bîn-á-tsài jī tsa̍p jī hō ê thinn-khì
un-tōo sann tsa̍p tsì sann tsa̍p sì tōo, lo̍h-hōo ki-lu̍t sì tsa̍p %
lâi-pin sann pah jī tsa̍p gōo hō tshiánn-lâi tsa̍p hō kuī-tâi pān-lí
lóng-tsóng la̍k pah káu tsa̍p la̍k khoo, tsāu lí sì khoo
kin-á-ji̍t sī tsa̍p-jī-gue̍h tsa̍p-sì, lé-pài
guá ê hōo-tsiàu hō-bé sī jī pat khòng ngóo kiú pat sam it kiú

tshiánn pang guá tsuán hun-ki lio̍k it kiú khòng
Lán-tsit-ê siánn-mih hiann, gâu-tsá.
Gâu-tsá! Ū sánn kùi-sū?
Tshíng-kàu--tsi̍t-ē, ùi tsia beh khì Phik-thâm, ài án-tsuánn kiânn?
Sūn Pak-sin-lōo hiòng Gî-lân ê hong-hiòng kiânn, tō ē king-kuè hia.
Koh tsioh-mn̄g--tsi̍t-ē, án-tsuánn khì khah hó-sè?
Tsē tsa̍p-it-hō-á ū khah hn̄g--lah ,
lí thìng-hó khiâ thih-bé 、 oo-tóo-bái, tsē kong-tshia 、 kè-tîng-tshia iah-sī sái tsū-ka-iōng--ê.
Ū sánn bô-kāng? Tshiánn kóng lâi tsò tsham-khó--tsi̍t-ē.
Iōng kiânn--ê nn̄g-tiám-guā-tsing kú m̄-tsai ē kàu--bē?
Khiâ thih-bé kiám-tshái tio̍h gōo-tsa̍p-hun-tsing;
tsē kong-tshia siōng-bô ài puànn-tiám-tsing;
khiâ ki-tshia tsha-put-to tsa̍p-gōo hun-tsing;
tsē Tha-khú-sih ia̍h sái tsū-ka-iōng--ê  liōng-iok-á ài jī-tsa̍p-hun-tsing kú.
Thinn-khì tsiah jua̍h,iōng kiânn--ê ia̍h  khiâ thih-bé kiann siunn thiám,
guá siūnn bueh khiâ oo-tóo-bái lâi-khì.
Khiâ oo-tóo-bái sī siōng-kài kín--lah,
m̄-koh tio̍h-ài ū kà-sú koh tio̍h-ài tì an-tsuân-bō. Lí kám ū tsah?
Kà-sú guá ū piān tī--leh, m̄-koh an-tsuân-bō-á tō bô--ah.
Án-ni lí siōng-hó mài khiâ oo-tóo-bái khì,
nā hōo kíng-tshat-á lia̍h--tio̍h, hua̍t gōo-pah-khoo sǹg-bē-hô.
Nā án-ne, guá tō tsē-tshia lâi-khì ;
koh-tsài tshíng-kàu--leh, ná-ē pênn-pênn tsē-tshia, kong-tshia 、 kè-tîng-á kah tsū-iōng-tshia ē tsha hiah tsē?
guá siōng kah-ì tsò ê tāi-tsì
tsok-tsiá: Lîm Kuì-hiong
"ah ~ im-ga̍k kā tsàu--lo̍h-khì,
tshiah-tshiah kā thiàu--lo̍h-khì,
lāu-jia̍t huann-huann-hí-hí",
thiann-tio̍h tsit siú kua,
lín sī m̄ sī kám-kak kha-té ngiau-ngiau siūnn-beh tián-khui kha-pōo thiàu-bú--leh?
 kóng:
tsi̍t phinn kám-tōng ê kòo-sū iah-sī tsi̍t siú ū ì-gī ê kua-sû,
ū-sî pí kuí-nā pah-bān jī ê sió-suat íng-hióng koh-khah tuā.
khak-si̍t sī án-ne!
tsin tsē liû-hîng kua-á ê kua-sû, tsiat-tsàu lóng tshim-tshim khik tī tsē-tsē lâng ê thâu-khak-lāi,
put-sî lán tō ē tshiùnn-kua lâi piáu-ta̍t sim-siann,
sīm-tsì kā kám-tōng thuân kàu tsuân sè-kài.
guá siōng kah-ì tsò ê tāi-tsì tō sī tshiòng-kua,
huann-hí ê sî tshiùnn-kua kā khuài-lo̍k hun-hióng hōo pa̍t-lâng;
huân-ló ê sî tshiùnn-kua kiám-khin sim-lāi ê ut-tsut;
kan-khóo ê sî tshiùnn-kua,
ióng-khì put-ti-put-kak tō it-ti̍t tsing-ka;
kín-tiunn ê sî tshiùnn-kua,
phi̍h-pho̍k-tshái ê sim-tsōng tō ē ta̍uh-ta̍uh-á bān--lo̍h-lâi.
tsóng-kóng--tsi̍t-kù sánn-mih sim-tsîng lóng tshuē ū tsi̍t siú kua lâi ha̍h.
thàu-kè kua-sû guá liáu-kái tio̍h guân-lâi mā ū lâng ū kah guá kāng-khuán ê kám-kak,
ū gōo-hue-tsa̍p-sik ê sing-ua̍h king-giām.
tsò-lâng ē-tàng tsioh tshiùnn-kua hōo-siong liáu-kái,
tō bē koo-koo-tuann-tuann.
Tī ha̍k-hāu siōng im-ga̍k khò,
khò-pún ū tsi̍t siú "bāng tshun-hong":
"koo-tuann bô phuānn siú ting-ē, tshing-hong tuì-bīn tshue";
kui-lōo tshiùnn tńg-khì kàu tshù,
siūnn bē kàu kui-ke-hué thiann-tio̍h guá ê kua-siann,
lóng su--ah su siang ki,
kuè-khì ê tsióng-tsióng kì-tî:
a-pa kóng i siūnn-khí tâm luân-ài ê sî
hit tsióng sng-kam-tinn-á-sng-kam-tinn ê tsu-bī,
a-kong kóng i siūnn-khí tshut-guā hùn-tàu ê tshing-tshun siàu-liân-sî.
tshin-tshiūnn Siau Hông-kî ê kua:
"Tâi-uân ê kua Tâi-uân ê uē Tâi-uân ê bī,
su--ah su siang ki im-ga̍k tō tshin-tshiūnn hue-luí
iû-kî sī uì lán thôo-kha senn--tshut-lâi ê ì-gī,
kám-tōng sī tsiok khó-kuì m̄-hó pàng buē kì
ta̍k-ke tsi̍t siann tsi̍t siann puê guá tshui--lo̍h-khì..."
tshiùnn-kua hōo kám-tsîng khiā sio-uá,
kiò-tshénn lán tuì ka-tī sîng-tióng ê thóo-tē ê tiōng-sī,
sán-sing ài kok-ka ài kòo-hiong ê kám-tsîng.
Tī ha̍k-hāu, ta̍k-ke tsò-hué tshiùnn-kua siāng tshù-bī,
siōng sî-kiânn ê liû-hîng-kua sian tshiùnn mā bē ià-siān,
tiōng-iàu ê tseh-ji̍t it-tīng ài ū kua-siann lâi tàu-lāu-jia̍t;
khìng-tsiok bú-tshin-tsiat ài tshiùnn-kua,
ūn-tōng-huē ài tshiùnn-kua,
pit-gia̍p tián-lé ài tshiùnn-kua,
iû-kî Sìng-tàn-tsiat ê sî,
kua-siann sī muá ke-lōo,
guá pá-ak ki-huē ta̍k tiâu kua lóng tshiùnn kah tshin-tshiūnn  "hué-sio ti-thâu ─ ─ bīn-si̍k-bīn-si̍k",
sīm-tsì sī si̍k kah tshàu-hué-ta kiam to̍h-hué,
bô-kāng ê kua-siann tō hōo guá siūnn-khí bô-kāng ê tsîng-kíng,
hōo lâng huâi-liām sing-ua̍h lāi-té ū kì-liām ì-gī ê ta̍p-ta̍p-tih-tih.
tshiùnn-kua tsiong siōng tiōng-iàu ê ji̍t-tsí tshīng tsuè tsi̍t tiâu pó-kuì ê tsin-tsu phua̍h-liān,
hōo sing-ua̍h koh-khah bí-lē.
muí tsi̍t tshut peh-tiám-tòng ê hì-kio̍k, lóng ū tsi̍t siú tsú-tê khik,
m̄-nā thè hì-kio̍k suan-thuân kah kóng-kò,
koh tsiong kio̍k-tsîng lông-sok tī sann gōo hun-tsing ê kua-sû lāi-té.
kuan-tsiòng ē-tàng lâu-lo̍h tshim-tshim-tshim ê ìn-siōng.
Lán muí tsi̍t ê lâng mā ū ka-tī ê tsú-tê khik,
khuann-khuann-á tshiùnn,
hōo-siong liáu-kái, hōo-siong him-sióng,
bô su-iàu gōo-kái ònn-ònn-jiáng.
bián kè-kàu kua-siann sī hó sī bái,
sim-lāi ū kua tō bē koo-tuann.
tshiùnn-kua sī guá siōng kah-ì tsò ê tāi-tsì,
ǹg-bāng ta̍k-ke mā lâi hiáng-siū tshiùnn-kua ê huann-hí.
sū-piàn ( gōo )
tsok-tsiá: Khu Uí-him
Hit kang sī oo-im-thinn,
thàu-hong koh lo̍h-hōo,
A-khîm tsi̍t-sì-lâng to buē pàng buē-kì--eh.
tsá-sî tshit peh tiám,
A-khîm kā in ang kóng,
kín khì tiàm-lāi,
tsiong ta̍t-tsînn ê mi̍h khuán tńg-lâi tshù tshàng hōo hó,
nā-bô, khióng-kiann hia tn̂g-suann ping ē khì tshiúnn.
In ang thiann-liáu,
tō kuánn-kín khì i ê hàn-io̍h tiàm.
A-hok--á thàu-tsá khí-lâi khuànn bô Tsài-tshik,
tō tsai-iánn tāi-tsì hāi--looh.
i tsin bô-nāi,
m̄-koh mā sī ài kín tsiong mi̍h-á kah tsi̍t-kuá tsînn khuán--khí-lâi,
lâi-khì A-khîm in tau bih.
tng-leh khuán mi̍h-kiānn ê sî,
kám-á-tiàm ê tuā-mn̂g suah hōo lâng tsàm--khui!
A-hok--á gia̍h-thâu khuànn-tio̍h sann ê lâng tsông--ji̍p-lâi,
iáu-buē khuànn tshing-tshó lâi--tsiá hô jîn,
kî-tiong tsi̍t ê ū tām-po̍h-á bīn-si̍k ê lâng,
the̍h tsi̍t ki oo-oo ê tshìng,
tshìng tíng-thâu koh ū pa̍k tsi̍t ki pe̍h-siak-siak, líng-ki-ki ê to,
tsit ê lâng tsi̍t kù uē to bô kóng,
kiânn hiòng A-hok--á,
tō-án-ne tsiong to-á uì i ê bak-tóo tshiám--lo̍h-khì!
A-hok--á ai tsi̍t siann siak-tó tī thôo-kha,
tāng-âng ê hueh uì pak-tóo tsuānn--tshut-lâi,
lâu kah kui-sì-kè.
hūn-bê tsìn-tsîng,
A-hok--á thiann-tio̍h tsi̍t kù Pak-kiann-uē:
kāng tsit ê sî-tsūn,
A-khîm in tau ê tuā-mn̂g mā hōo lâng tuā-la̍t lòng--khui.
tshit peh ê a-ping-ko gia̍h tn̂g-tshìng pin-pin-piàng-piàng tsông--ji̍p-lâi,
A-khîm ê tuā-hàn hāu-senn kah tsa-bóo-kiánn kiann kah háu--tshut-lâi.
A-khîm hiông-hiông-kông-kông tsiong tsuân-pōo ê gín-á lóng khiú lâi ka-tī sin-khu-pinn;
bīn-tuì tsia-ê kun-jîn,
i ê siann-im sui-jiân ē tshuah,
iu-guân tuā-siann huah: "lín beh tshòng sánn!?"
tsi̍t ê kun-jîn iōng tsiânn pháinn ê kháu-khì kóng Pak-kiann-uē.
A-khîm thiann-bô,
tsí-sī tsiong i ê gín-á jú khiú jú ân,
tsi̍t pái koh tsi̍t pái tuā-siann huah:
"lín beh tshòng sánn!?", "lín beh tshòng sánn!?"
khiā tī mn̂g-kha-kháu ê tsi̍t miâ kun-jîn,
khuànn--khí-lâi sī kun-kuann,
tuì lāi-té ê ping-á hā bīng-līng.
kuí-nā ê ping-á,
iōng tshìng siòng tuì A-khîm kah gín-á,
kiông pik in kiânn tshut-mn̂g,
lâi kàu tîng-á-kha kuī--lo̍h-lâi.
gín-á lú háu lú tuā-siann,
ping-á kin-pún bô leh tshap-siâu--in,
koh the̍h tsi̍t tiâu tuā-tiâu soh-á,
tsiong in kui-ke-hué ná bah-tsàng kāng-khuán pa̍k--khí-lâi.
khai-sí lo̍h-hōo--ah.
hōo-tsuí líng-ki-ki,
ak tī A-khîm kah gín-á ê thâu-bīn tsham sin-khu.
a-ping-ko tī in ê sin-khu-pinn the̍h tshìng kiânn-lâi-kiânn-khì,
A-khîm ê tuā-hàn hāu-senn it-ti̍t háu,
i ê tsa-bóo-kiánn uá tī i sin-khu-pinn,
ná háu koh it-ti̍t kiò: "a-bú ! a-bú !"
A-khîm tsiânn kiann-hiânn,
i siūnn-tio̍h ka-tī pak-tóo-lāi iah-koh ū tsi̍t ê buē tshut-sì ê gín-á,
m̄ tsai sī tsa-poo ia̍h-sī tsa-bóo?
i sim tsi̍t huâinn,
tuì i sin-khu-pinn ê gín-á kóng:
"M̄-bián kiann, a-bú tī tsia.
Beh sí, lán tsò-tīn sí!"
A-khîm ê ba̍k-sái it-ti̍t lâu, it-ti̍t lâu,
tshin-tshiūnn hōo it-ti̍t lo̍h, it-ti̍t lo̍h,
i sim-lāi it-ti̍t kā pak-tóo-lāi ê gín-á huē-sit-lé :
"khó-liân ê gín-á,
lí bē-hù tshut-sì,
m̄ sī a-bú bô ài--lí,
lán tsò-hué lo̍h-lâi im-kan,
a-bú kāng-khuán ē kā lí sioh-miā-miā."
( āu kî tsiap-suà )
it-kiam-jī-kòo, bong lâ-á kiam sé khòo
tsok-tsiá: Lí Lâm-hîng
Tâi-uân ê sio̍k-gí-uē ū kuí-nā tsióng hîng-sik,
ū tsi̍t tsióng sī kan-na kóng tsîng puànn kù, tòng-tiām,
āu puànn kù iá-bē kóng,

lán bô ing-kai hòng-khì tá-tsō " beh kiàn-li̍p koh-khah kiān-tsuân ê kok-ka, koh-khah kong-gī ê siā-huē" ê ǹg-bāng.
"suán-kí" sī hiān-tshú-sî kái-piàn Tâi-uân tiānn-tio̍h ài kiânn ê lōo-suànn,
lán ta̍k-ke bô-it-tīng lóng ē si̍t-tsè tsham-ú tsò tsìng-tī jîn-bu̍t,
m̄-kù lán ê suán-phiò sī tsin-tú-tsin ê tsìng-tī tsu-sán.
suán-phiò sī lán siōng hó ê bú-khì,
khì tuì-khòng hia-ê put-kong-put-gī ê tsìng-hú kuann-guân,
tse sī lán sin-uî tsi̍t ê kong-bîn ài jīn-bat--ê.
Thuat-Hàn tsiah sī Tâi-uân ê pîng-an-hû
tsok-tsiá: Tsiúnn Uî-bûn
Tâi-uân kah Ua̍t-lâm kāng-khuán,
Sī ài hô-pîng, kóng tō-lí, kah tui-kiû bîn-tso̍k to̍k-li̍p ê kok-ka.
Ū kú-tn̂g ê sî-kan,
Tâi-uân kah Ua̍t-lâm lóng siū-tio̍h Tiong-kok ê ui-hia̍p.
Tuì-tio̍h tsit tsām Tiong-kok tī Tang-lâm-a-hái ué iû ín-huat tsú-khuân kiù-hun,
Lán kah Ua̍t-lâm kāng li̍p-tiûnn tuì Tiong-kok thê-tshut giâm-lē ê khián-tsik!
Lán khíng-tīng Ua̍t-lâm bîn-tsiòng ū iû-hîng sī-ui kā Tiong-kok khòng-gī ê khuân-lī.
Tuì-tio̍h pōo-hūn sī-ui bîn-tsiòng gōo-kái Tâi-uân-lâng sī Tiong-kok-lâng,
Koh iōng po̍k-li̍k ê hong-sik guî-hāi Tâi-siong sìnn-miā tsâi-sán ê hîng-uî,
Lán mā giâm-tiōng khián-tsik.
Lán kiông-lia̍t iau-kiû Ua̍t-lâm tsìng-hú ū gī-bū kah tsik-jīm pó-hōo Tâi-siong sìnn-miā tsâi-sán ê an-tsuân,
Mā ài kā Ua̍t-lâm bîn-tsiòng suan-tō "Tâi-uân-lâng m̄ sī Tiong-kok-lâng"!
Ua̍t-lâm bat ū tāi-iok tsi̍t tshing tang hōo Tiong-kok hong-kiàn ông-tiâu ti̍t-tsiap thóng-tī ê Pak-sio̍k sî-kî.
Kong-guân tsa̍p sè-kí Ua̍t-lâm kiàn-li̍p hong-kiàn ông-tiâu liáu,
Mā koh hām Tiong-kok uî-tshî phuan-sio̍k kuan-hē tsiânn tshing tang.
Kàu kah it pat pat ngóo nî Huat-kok kah Tshing-kok tshiam-tīng Thian-tin tiâu-iok,
Tshing-kok tsiah tsìng-sik hòng-khì tsong-tsú-kok ê tē-uī.
Ua̍t-lâm-lâng m̄ guān tsò Tiong-kok ê ē-kha-tshiú-lâng,
Tō tshin-tshiūnn Tâi-uân-lâng m̄ guān hōo Tiong-huâ-bîn-kok hām Tiong-huâ-jîn-bîn-kiōng-hô-kok lôo-tsâi thóng-tī kāng-khuán.
Tâi-uân-lâng lí-kái Ua̍t-lâm-lâng "pâi Huâ" ê sim-tsîng,
Mā tshiánn Ua̍t-lâm pîng-iú liáu-kái "Tâi-uân-lâng m̄ sī Huâ-jîn, koh-khah m̄ sī Tiong-kok-lâng"!
Tī Pak-sio̍k sî-kî,
Hàn-jī thuân ji̍p Ua̍t-lâm.
Hit-tsūn ê Hàn-jī tsú-iàu sī thóng-tī-tsiá ê bûn-jī.
Tī Pak-sio̍k tsîng-kî,
Ua̍t-lâm-lâng bat Hàn-jī mā bô tsâi-tiāu tsò-kuann.
Tī tsit ê sî-kî,
Ua̍t-lâm mā sī "sann nî tsi̍t sió huán, gōo nî tsi̍t tuā luān"!
Siōng tsá ê khí-gī sī Ting Tshik kah Ting Gī nn̄g tsí-muāi.
In thui-huan Hàn-tiâu tsū kau-tsí ê thài-siú Soo Tīng,
Bat tit-tio̍h té-tsiām ê to̍k-li̍p.
Tī Ua̍t-lâm thuat-lî Tiong-kok ti̍t-tsiap thóng-tī liáu ê tsi̍t tshing guā tang,
Ua̍t-lâm hong-kiàn ông-tiâu ín-tsìn kho-kí tsè-tōo kah jû-ka su-sióng lâi kióng-kòo hong-kiàn ê ki-tshóo.
Uānn uē kóng,
Sui-bóng Ua̍t-lâm bô koh hōo Tiong-kok thóng-tī,
M̄-koh iah sī siū Tiong-kok tsin tshim ê íng-hióng.
Bo̍k-kuài Ua̍t-lâm ū-miâ ê li̍k-sú ha̍k-ka Tân Tiōng-kim tī i thâu pún iōng Ua̍t-lâm Lô-má-jī su-siá ê "Ua̍t-lâm sú-lio̍k" lāi-té kám-khài kóng:
"Bô-lūn tuā-lâng gín-á, tī ha̍k-hāu lóng bô o̍h Ua̍t-lâm-sú, kan-na o̍h Tiong-kok-sú.
Siá si siá bûn-tsiong mā tio̍h tsiàu Tiong-kok ê kui-kí, siū Tiong-kok kè-ta̍t-kuan ê íng-hióng."
Tsit khuán ê sim-sng,
Tâi-uân kám m̄ sī kāng-khuán?
Kong-guân it kiú sù ngóo nî káu gue̍h tshe lī,
Ôo Tsì-bîng tsú-si̍k tī Ba Dinh kóng-tiûnn suan-pòo Ua̍t-lâm to̍k-li̍p.
Kāng hit kang,
Liân-kun thóng-suè MacAuther mā huat-pòo tē it hō bīng-līng,
Tsí-phài Tsiúnn Kài-si̍k tāi-piáu liân-kun tsiap-siū Tiong-kok, Tâi-uân kah pak-uí tsa̍p la̍k tōo í-siōng Ua̍t-lâm kíng-lāi ê Ji̍t-pún kun tâu-hâng.
Tsiúnn Kài-si̍k kin-kì tsit ê bīng-līng tsìn-ji̍p Ua̍t-lâm, Tâi-uân kah Tang-lâm-a-hái tó-sū.
Tng Ji̍t-kun tâu-hâng suah,
Ôo Tsì-bîng lī-iōng Huat-kok ê li̍k-liōng iau-kiû Tsiúnn Kài-si̍k suî lī-khui Ua̍t-lâm,
Ka-tsài bô tsiânn-tsò Tiong-huâ-bîn-kok ê tsi̍t síng.
Khó-sioh it kiú sù tshit nî Tâi-uân ê Jī-jī-pat khí-gī bô sîng-kong,
Suah hōo Tsiúnn Kài-si̍k ū ki-huē kā liû-bông tsìng-hú suá lâi Tâi-uân.
Ua̍t-lâm-lâng iōng Hàn-jī nn̄g tshing tang liáu tsóng-sǹg kak-ngōo bô koh iōng Tiong-kok-jī.
Ôo Tsì-bîng huat-pòo to̍k-li̍p suan-giân liáu ê káu gue̍h tshe peh koh suan-pòo huì Hàn-jī,
Tsuân-bīn tshui-sak Lô-má-jī ê kàu-io̍k tsìng-tshik.
Tuì-tsiàu tsi-hā,
Tâi-uân-lâng iah khut-ho̍k tī Tiong-huâ-bîn-kok to̍k-tsun Tiong-kok-gí ê tsìng-tshik.
Bo̍k-kuài sú-iōng Hàn-jī kah Tiong-kok-uē ê Tâi-siong ē hōo Ua̍t-lâm-lâng tòng-tsò sī Tiong-kok-lâng.
Tâi-uân-lâng beh pī-bián hông tòng-tsò Tiong-kok-lâng,
Tsi̍t-hong-bīn ài tī tsìng-tī-siōng hām Tiong-kok tsò tshiat-kuah,
Tshiūnn kóng tsè sin hiàn-huat kah kā kok-hō kái-tsò Tâi-uân.
Līng-guā tsi̍t-hong-bīn ài ka-kiông Tâi-uân kàu-io̍k kah tshòng-tsō sik-ha̍p pún-thóo bûn-huà sing-tsûn ê thé-tsè,
Khó-pí kóng pit-siu Tâi-uân li̍k-sú hām Tâi-uân gí-bûn,
Huì Hàn-jī, kái iōng Lô-má-jī hit khuán--ê.
tuì gí-bûn tsú-thé-sìng ê kak-tōo khuànn--khí-lâi,
Ua̍t-lâm-lâng tuì ka-tī ê bú-gí khah tiōng.
Tse mā sī Ua̍t-lâm ē-tàng tī pà-khuân ê làng-phāng lāi-té kiû sing-tsûn ê tiōng-iàu guân-in
Hāu-hn̂g ê tsîng-hūn
Tī tsit ê tiong-ha̍k lāi-té,
ha̍k-sing tsi-kan ê kám-tsîng, tàu-té ē ū siánn-mih ti̍k-pia̍t neh?
"Aih, lí khuànn hit ê ha̍k-tióng ū kàu iân-tâu--ê,
A-hun lí kám-kak hit ê lâng án-tsuánn ah?"
A-thô kóng kah beh lâu tshuì-nuā ah!
"Lí ooh! Ná tshinn-tshiūnn A-hue kâng-khuánn,
lóng sī leh siūnn lí ê ha̍k-tióng!"
A-hun kî-si̍t khuànn-tio̍h hit ê tsa-poo-lâng tiō tò-tuānn ah!
Ū tsi̍t kang, A-hun khì i ê kàu-sik siōng-khò ê sî-tsūn, khì lòng-tio̍h A-thô kah-ì ê ha̍k-tiúnn.
"Aih, lí lóng bô leh khuànn lōo ooh! Lòng-tio̍h guá ê sin-khu tsiok tuā-la̍t koh tsiok thiànn--ê lah!"
Hit ê ha̍k-tióng tsiok siū-khì--ê,
i koh kiò A-hun khì piān-sóo tshuē--i, siūnn beh tshut tsi̍t kháu khuì.
Hit ê A-hun kám-kak i ū kàu khióng-pòo--ê, m̄-koh mā kuai-kuai khì piān-sóo tshuē i
"Ha ha ha! Lí lâi ah! Guá mn̄g lí tsi̍t--ē,
lí thâu-tú-á kā guá lòng-tio̍h, beh iōng siánn-mih hong-sik kā guá huē sit-lé neh?"
Hit ê ha̍k-tióng jú uá jú kīn, A-hun si̍t-tsāi tsiok kín-tiunn--ê, i siūnn kóng beh án-tsuánn kóng khah hó!
"ha̍k-tiúnn, pháinn-sè lah! Hit ê sî-tsūn guá leh kuánn-kông beh siōng-khò,
bô sè-lī lòng-tio̍h lí, lí mài siū-khì lah!"
A-hun tng-teh kóng ê sî-tsūn, hōo A-thô khuànn--tio̍h,
i m̄ kam-guān i ài ê ha̍k-tióng hām i tī piān-sóo ê guā-kháu kóng-uē.
A-thô siūnn beh tuì i ê pîng-iú A-hun pìnn-khang, m̄-koh i kiann ē hōo lâng huat-hiān, tō m̄-kánn ah !
Hit ê ha̍k-tiúnn kiò A-tang, i tī ha̍k-hāu sī tsi̍t ê tsiânn siū huann-gîng ê tsa-poo  gín-á!
"Eh, lí khuànn hit ê sam-pat A-hue lâi ah neh!Khì kā i tshòng-tī tsi̍t ē!"
Hit ê kóng-uē ê lâng mā sī kah-ì ha̍k-tiúnn ê lâng, i kiò tsò A-tîng,
i mā tsiok uàn-tòo A-hun thài-ē hām ha̍k-tiúnn kiânn hiah kīn.
Kî-si̍t hit ê ha̍k-tiúnn tsí sī siūnn beh tuì A-hun tsia̍h-tshenn-kha niā niā, bô leh kah-ì A-hun,
m̄-kò tuì kî-tha ê tsa-bóo-gín-á lâi kóng sī tsiok bē-sóng ê tāi-tsì!
Hit ê A-hun huat-hiān i í-king ū tsi̍t-tiám-á leh kah-ì ha̍k-tiúnn,
i mā m̄-tsai-iánn i sī siánn-mih sî-tsūn ài--tio̍h-ê.
"Guá kah-ì ha̍k-tiúnn ê tāi-tsì tshian-bān m̄-thang kóng, ah bô guá tō ē tsiok tshi-tshám ê!"
A-hun sim-lāi leh siūnn tsit-kiānn tāi-tsì.

hit khuán bî-bî-á-iô, mî-mî-á-tsùn,

A-hun kàu tsit-má koh m̄-tsai iánn, i aì ê lâng mā tehleh kah-ì i.
Nā-sī i tsai, it-tīng tsiok huann-hí--ê.
Hit ê A-tang kā A-hun tsia̍h-tshenn-kha ê lâng mēmā kah tsiânn tuā-siann, tsin hùn-nōo, tshuētshē hiah ê lâng sǹg-siàu.
Āu-lâi, in nn̄g ê lâng tōtiōtio̍hto̍h tsò-hué--ah,
A-tang sī tsin-sim tehleh kah-ì A-hun, A-hun mā kám-kak tsiok hīng-hok--ê.
Liân i ê pîng-iú A-thô mā tsin-sim tsiok-hok in nn̄g lâng ē-tàng hīng-hok.
Ha̍k-tiúnn A-tang khó--tio̍h ê tāi-ha̍k, āu-lâi A-hun mā khó--tio̍h,
in nn̄g ê lâng ê ài-tsîng kòo-sū mā thuân kàu tsuân ha̍k-hāu lóng tsai-iánn--ah!
Ta̍k-ke lóng tsiok hok in neh!
suà-lo̍h-lâi khuànn tâi-pak tshī bîn-á-tsài la̍k hō ê thinn-khì
un-tōo jī-tsa̍p jī tsì jī-tsa̍p tshit tōo, lo̍h-hōo ki-lu̍t tshit-tsa̍p %
lâi-pin sì-pah tshit-tsa̍p káu hō tshiánn-lâi gōo hō kuī-tâi pān-lí
lóng-tsóng tshit-pah tsa̍p-gōo khoo, tsāu lí peh-tsa̍p gōo khoo
kin-á-ji̍t sī tsa̍p-gue̍h tshe-sam, pài-la̍k
guá ê hōo-tsiàu hō-bé sī tshit it kiú sam jī sù jī it it
gún-tau ê tiān-uē hō-bé sī khòng pat ngóo pat lio̍k pat it khòng khòng
i-tī it kiú lio̍k pat nî tshut-sì
tshiánn pang guá tsuán hun-ki sam jī khòng it
Sing-ua̍h Tuì-uē
Tshiánn-mn̄g, tsit-tsūn kuí tiám?
Nn̄g tiám tsa̍p hun. Lí beh tshòng siánn-mih?
Guá nn̄g tiám puànn tio̍h khì siōng khò.
Lí kuí tiám ē hā khò?
Gōo tiám.
Lí tsi̍t ji̍t siōng kuí tiám-tsing ê khò?
Tsi̍t ji̍t siōng nn̄g tiám puànn tsing.
Lán lâi-khì tsia̍h tsi̍t-tiám-á mi̍h-kiānn, hó--bô?
Sit-lé, guá tsit-má tsí ū kuí hun-tsing niā-niā.
Ing-àm tsa̍p tiám puànn ū hong-piān--bô?
Sit-lé, guá phóo-thong àm-sî tsa̍p tiám khùn.
Hiah-nī tsá!
Án-ne, bô-iàu-kín.
Lán āu lé-pài lâi-khì Ji̍t-gua̍t-thâm tshit-thô--kuí-ji̍t-á, hó--bô?
Sit-lé, tāi-khài bē-tàng,
in-uī tíng kò-gue̍h guá tsiah khai-sí o̍h Tâi-uân-uē,
sóo-í tsit-má bô sî-kan thang tshit-thô.
Í-āu tsiah lâi-khì, hó--bô?
Hó, hó.
Bûn-tsiunn it
tshian kim bé tshù, bān kim bé tshù-pinn
tsok-tsiá: Kang Tîng-tshiū
"tshian kim bé tshù, bān kim bé tshù-pinn",
tsit kù sio̍k-gí ê ì-sù tsiânn kán-tan,
tiō sī kóng bé tshù ê sî-tsūn,
ti̍k-pia̍t ài khó-lū  tshù-nih tsiu-pinn ê khuân-kíng kah tshù-pinn-thâu-bué sóo tuà--ê sī siánn-mih-lâng.
khuân-kíng hām tshù-pinn óng-óng pí tshù pún-sin ê kè-ta̍t khah tiōng-iàu.
tsit-má lán tō lâi kóng tsi̍t-kuá hiān-si̍t-tiong ê būn-tê,
nā-sī koo-tsiah-tshù ia̍h-sī thàu-thinn-tshù,
íng-hióng tō khah tsió,
ah nā siā-khu-hîng--ê kah tuā-lâu kong-ú,
he tō tsha tsin tsē--loh.
tuà siā-khu--ê siōng kiann,
tshù-pinn-thâu-bué ū tshī káu--ê,
m̄ sī tshut-ji̍p ê mn̂g-kháu, hāng-á-kháu, tsuan-tsuan káu-sái,
tō sī àm-sî hōo káu puī kah put-tik an-lîng.
nā-sī tú-tio̍h keh-piah ài tshiùnn khah-la-oo-kheh iah-sī ài phah-muâ-tshiok--ê,
mā sī kui-ê hāng-á, kui-ê siā-khu lāu-jia̍t-kún-kún,
ná tshài-tshī-á--leh.
suà--lo̍h lâi kóng tuā-lâu kong-ú,
he tō koh-khah tshi-tshám,
siā-khu-hîng--ê ē tú-tio̍h--ê,
i tsi̍t hāng tō bē khiàm,
koh ka-sióng nā ū ka-tîng pō-li̍k ê tshù-pinn,
ta̍k-kang thiann-tio̍h phah kiánn iah-sī ang-bóo sio-phah ê siann,
ná leh him-sióng siak-kak--leh.
koh ū, nā tú-tio̍h lâu-tíng piān-sóo lāu-tsuí, tsuí-kóng bē thong,
hāi lâu-kha thian-pông tih tsuí,
kā kóng bô-hāu, m̄ siu-lí,
he tsiah-sī beh khàu bô ba̍k-sái.
sóo-í, bé tshù ê sî tio̍h-ài tsim-tsiok.
nā bé sin tshù,
khuànn tē-tiám, khuànn king-keh, khuànn kiàn-tsâi;
nā-sī bé kū tshù,
tû-liáu tsia-ê í-guā,
siōng tiōng-iàu--ê sī khuân-kíng kah tshù-pinn.
tsuè-āu kóng tsi̍t ê kòo-sū kah ta̍k-ke hun-hióng,
khuànn tshù-pinn ū tiōng-iàu ia̍h  bô.
ū tsi̍t ê tsin ū-miâ ê tsok-ka,
tuà tī tsi̍t ê too-tshī ê guā-uî,
khuân-kíng tshing-iu khong-khì hó,
hōo i ū hó lîng-kám,
tshòng-tsok tsin tsē tshut-miâ ê tsok-phín,
mā thàn liáu bē-tsió tsînn.
bô-gî-gōo tsiànn-pîn keh-piah,
puann-lâi tsi̍t ê tsò ba̍k-kang--ê,
ta̍k-kang ài thiann i kì pang-á ê siann,
hōo i sit-khì siá-tsok ê lîng-kám.
kuè bô luā kú,
tò-pîng keh-piah koh puann-lâi tsi̍t ê tsò thih-kang--ê,
kui-ji̍t khi-khi-khok-khok phah-thih ê siann,
hōo i koh-khah thâu-thiànn.
tsit-siann m̄-nā hōo i bô-huat-tōo siá bûn-tsiunn,
liân sing-ua̍h ê pōo-tiāu mā lóng luān--khì,
kuat-tīng beh siūnn tsi̍t ê pān-huat,
lâi kái-kuat tsit ê būn-tê.
bué--á tsóng-sǹg hōo i siūnn-tio̍h tsi̍t ê hó pān-huat,
i tō iau-tshiánn tsò ba̍k-kang--ê kah tsò thih-kang--ê lâi hōo i tshiánn,
kóng sī ta̍k-ke hó tshù-pinn,
beh liân-lo̍k kám-tsîng.
tsia̍h-pn̄g, lim-tsiú kàu tsi̍t-puànn ê sî,
tsit ê tsok-ka to̍h thê-tshut kiàn-gī,
hi-bāng in nn̄g ê puann-tshù,
i m̄-nā ē thè in tshut puann-tshù ê huì-iōng,
koh beh sàng in tsi̍t pit tsînn.
tsò ba̍k-kang--ê kah tsò thih-kang--ê to̍h kóng in ài khó-lū--tsi̍t-ē,
tsuè-āu in nn̄g ê tah-ìng tsok-ka ê iau-kiû,
pīng-tshiánn ài hōo in tsi̍t lé-pài ê sî-kan,
tsok-ka mā tsin a-sá-lih,
sing hù tsi̍t-puànn ê tsînn hōo--in.
tsi̍t lé-pài āu thàu-tsá,
tsiànn-pîng tsò ba̍k-kang--ê tshù thâu-tsîng lâi tsi̍t tâi thoo-lá-khuh,
khai-sí kā sóo-ū ê mi̍h-kiānn tsiūnn-tshia.
kuè bô guā kú,
tò-pîng tsò thih-kang--ê mā tshiànn tsi̍t tâi thoo-lá-khuh lâi puann mi̍h-kiānn.
tsin kín nn̄g king ê mi̍h-kiānn tsóng puann hó-sè,
tsok-ka koh hù līng-guā tsi̍t-puànn ê tsînn,
nn̄g tâi tshia tsò-tīn sái tsáu.
tsit-sî tsok-ka kui-ê sim-tsîng tsiâu khin-sang,
siūnn-kóng tsia-ê tsînn khai liáu tsin ū kè-ta̍t.
kuè tsha-put-to tiám-guā-tsing,
thâu-tú-á sái tsáu hit nn̄g tâi thoo-lá-khuh koh sái--tńg-lâi,
tsí-sī tsiànn-pîng tsò ba̍k-kang--ê hit tâi,
uānn sái khì tò-pîng,
tò-pîng tsò thih-kang--ê hit tâi,
uānn sái khì tsiànn-pîng.
nn̄g ê lóng ū puann-tshù,
tit-tio̍h ìng-kai tit ê kim-tsînn,
tsok-ka liáu-tsînn suah bô-huat-tōo siau-tsai,
tsin-tsiànn sī "khan-ti-ko, phàng-kiàn tsînn".
Bûn-tsiong jī
Ua̍t-lâm pit-kì
tsok-tsiá: Âng Ik-sim
hânn lí khì Ua̍t-lâm--ooh?
hia m̄ sī tsiok lo̍k-ngóo?
ah in hia kám kóng Ing-gí?
ia̍h-sī lí ē-hiáu kóng Ua̍t-lâm-gí--ooh?
tse sī guá sin-pinn to-sòo ê pîng-iú tuì guá khì Ua̍t-lâm tha̍k-tsheh ê huán-ìng.
guá kah lán Tâi-lô-huē tsi̍t-tīn Tâi-gí lāu-su
tī tsi̍t tang tsîng í-king sing tī Sîng-tāi Ua̍t-lâm-gí tiong-sim ê ha̍k-hun-pan siu Ua̍t-lâm-gí,
tsit piàn hioh-jua̍h khì Ua̍t-lâm tha̍k-tsheh,
sī beh tsìng-bîng ka-kī ha̍k-si̍p ê sîng-kó kah si̍t-li̍k giām-siu.
tsit tsuā khì sūn-suà tsiap āu-piah ê kau-liû-thuân beh tsiong-kīn nn̄g kò gue̍h ê sî-kan.
khuànn-tio̍h tse lò-lò-tn̂g ê hāu-miâ,
tsi̍t-khai-sí tsin-tsiànn kiann--sí bē-hiáu tha̍k,
sī Ôo-tsì-bîng-tshī kok-ka tāi-ha̍k jîn-bûn í siā-huē kho-ha̍k tāi-ha̍k.
tsit pái ū līng-guā an-pâi kah in hāu-lāi Huâ-gí-hē ê ha̍k-sing kau-liû,
Tsiúnn Uî-bûn kàu-siū tī hia tsiok tshìng,
sī hām guá kâng tsoo ê tsa-bóo ha̍k-sing kóng--ê.
sui-jiân in tsai-iánn Tâi-uân kah Tiong-kok bô kâng,
khiok tuì Tâi-gú sī tshenn-soo ū--ê sīm-tsì m̄ bat thiann--kuè,
tī gí-giân tiong-sim ē-tàng khuànn-tio̍h tsiok tsē Au-tsiu, Tang-au, Ji̍t-pún-lâng, Hân-kok-lâng teh ha̍k-si̍p Ua̍t-lâm-gí,
lāu-huè-á koh bē tsió,
lāu-su kóng Tâi-uân ha̍k-sing khah tsió.
gún tsit pái khì siōng sì lé-pài ê khò-thîng,
hun tshoo-kip kah tiong-kip nn̄g pan koh ū nn̄g pái khó-tshì.
uì ti-ti-tû-tû kàu ē-hiáu hām lāu-su khai-káng kóng-tshiò,
tī kî-tiong-khó ê la̍k ia̍h A4 tshì-tê kìng-jiân lóng khuànn-ū tha̍k-ū,
ka-kī lóng kám-kak tsiok ū sîng-tsiū-kám,
kám-tōng kah kiōng-beh khàu--tshut-lâi,
tong-tshoo o̍h Ing-gí to̍h bô tsit tsióng kám-tōng ê sim-tsîng,
tsāi-tē ê Ua̍t-lâm gí-giân lāu-su tsin-tsiànn gâu kà.
sī kóng tī Tâi-uân tsia-ê Ua̍t-lâm-gí láu-su m̄ tsai sī siū lán tsit-khuán thé-tsè íng-hióng nih,
ū-iánn tsha tsi̍t khuì.
tī sing-ua̍h-tiong liân gún tuà--ê tshing-liân lú-siā ê kang-tsok tshing-liân,
kìng-jiân mā m̄ tsai Tâi-gú sī siánn?
sī kóng tse kám ē-sái kuài--lâng?
Tâi-siong tī hia, kè lâi Tâi-uân--ê,
tsìng-hú sī siánn teh tshui-sak Tâi-gú? kuan-sim Tâi-gú?
kui-ê Ua̍t-lâm to-sòo iā-sī kan-nā tsai-iánn Huâ-gí niâ.
sui-jiân in ū tsin tsē pîng-iú kè lâi lán Tâi-uân
m̄-koh tse pīng bô pang-tsān,
in-uī bô kàu-ha̍k,
kah lâm-hong ê sī-tuā-lâng tshò-gōo ê kuan-liām mā ū tsha.
tiōng-tiám sī Tâi-uân īng Tiong-huâ-bîn-kok teh thè Tiong-kok hîng-siau,
liân siāng kán-tan piān-sik ê gí-giân mā hông pak-siah.
tsìng-hú ê lâm hiòng tsìng-tshik sī sńg tsin--ê ia̍h-sī ké--ê?
pún sī ài kám-kak tshin-tshiat ê sóo-tsāi,
suah ū tsi̍t tsióng sim-hân hông pàng-sak ê tshe-liâng,
in-uī Tâi-gú tuì Ua̍t-lâm-lâng lâi kóng tsiânn sī tshenn-hūn.
Bûn-tsiong sann
tsē kong-tshia tú-tio̍h Tâi-uân-lâng,
i tī Ua̍t-lâm tâu-tsu jī-tsa̍p-kuí tang,
bē-hiáu Ua̍t-lâm-gí koh kóng m̄-bián o̍h,
khai-tsînn tshiànn--lâng to̍h hó,
hah hah kah si̍t-bîn tsìng-hú kāng-khuán ê sim-thài,
sóo-í thiann gún lâi o̍h Ua̍t-lâm-gí i mā kiann-tsi̍t-tiô!
tsi̍t-tīn-lâng khì tsia̍h-pn̄g lóng kóng Tâi-gú in sī it-ti̍t ioh bô tó-uī lâi--ê?
nā ka-kī tsi̍t ê khì tsia̍h-pn̄g it-tīng hông mn̄g kóng sī m̄ sī tsi-ná?
nā-sī beh khí-kè.
lâng thian-sìng sī siān-liông--ê,
nā bô khì kâng thún-ta̍h,
lâng lóng sī huan-gîng,
phian-phian-á tsit ê pháinn tshù-pinn tài sái khì khan-liân--tio̍h.
sui-jiân Ua̍t-lâm iah-koh leh kái-kik-tiong,
hó-bái tong-jiân kok tsiàm tsi̍t-puànn,
m̄-thang ba̍k-tsiu kan-na beh khia lâng khuànn ē tio̍h sóo-tsāi,
ìng-kai iōng-sim kau-puê puânn-nuá tī khuànn bē tio̍h ê tsîng-hūn,
in siàu-liân-lâng bô lâng teh kiann ha̍k-li̍k kē,
tsí kiann bô kang-tsok ki-huē.
kok guā-gí sī liu-liu kiò,
mn̄g i tsiah piànn-sè beh tshòng siánn?
lóng kóng ē tshut ka-kī tiong, tn̂g-kî ê bo̍k-phiau.
tsiok sîng jī-tsa̍p tang tsîng ê Tâi-uân,
ū khì-phik ū lí-sióng khíng phah-piànn iáu tsin tsē.
tong-tē Ua̍t-lâm-lâng kah kè lâi Tâi-uân ê khì-tsit tsin-tsiànn bô kâng,
sing-ua̍h sui-jiân bô-thang hó m̄-koh bē tshiūnn tī Tâi-uân--ê hiah kan-khiáu.
in-uî bo̍k-tsiân tī Ua̍t-lâm ê siau-huì koh sǹg sio̍k
ū tsiok tsē Tâi-siong it-ti̍t tshînn,
tsò-sing-lí guá sī bô hìng-tshù,
m̄-koh tâu-tsu tī o̍h gí-giân ê kak-tōo sī koh sǹg ē hô,
í-āu ū ki-huē ìng-kai ē kè-sio̍k khì hia tshit-thô, tha̍k-tsheh.
sió-sió ê tâu-tsu hōo guá koh ke o̍h ē-hiáu tsit hāng ē-tàng iōng lâi hóo lâng ê kang-hu,
phiau-phiat ê jîn-sing nā ke-kiám o̍h, ke-kiám khîng,
bô-tiānn-tio̍h ē lia̍p-tsik tshut siánn-mi̍h liāu-sióng-bē-kàu ê kòo-sū,
koh Ua̍t-lâm-gí kah Tâi-gú tsiap-kīn ê su-siá, gí-ì,
ū-sim sann nî tshut-sai, bô-sim tsi̍t-sì-lâng tài sái,
Tâi-gú khan-tshiú Ua̍t-lâm-gí phah-tó Huâ-gí kám ē sîng-kong?
la̍k、Bûn-tsiunn sì
tsun-tiōng sènn-miā
tsok-tsiá: Kang Tîng-tshiū
guân-tsok ( Huâ-gí ): Kang Bīng-hian
huan-tsoh Tâi-gú: Kang Tîng-tshiū
sènn-miā ê tsûn-tsāi kè-ta̍t sī siánn-mi̍h?
sī thàn-tsînn?
sī miâ-siann tē-uī?
sīm-tsì sī tit-tio̍h lú-jîn?
m̄ sī!
lóng m̄ sī!
tsīn-sim, phah-piànn tī ū sinn tsi liân,
put-tuān ê tsū-ngóo tu̍t-phuà, tshiau-ua̍t ka-kī.
tio̍h sǹg tī ki̍k kî khùn-khóo tang-tiong mā ài thê-sing ka-kī ê lîng-li̍k,
lâi bīn-tuì jīm-hô ê khùn-lân,
tse tsiah-sī guá ê "tsûn-tsāi kè-ta̍t".
 sī tsi̍t ê tit-tio̍h tsuè ko îng-iāu ê tuā bûn-ha̍k-ka,
tsuè-āu suah í tsū-sat lâi uī tsit pōo " jîn-sing ê hí" tsò kiat-sok.
îng-iāu ná-tshiūnn tsi̍t tsō ko ji̍p hûn-tíng ê kuân tshiûnn,
tsóo-tòng tsit uī tuā bûn-ha̍k-ka.
sui-jiân king-kuè put-tuān ê khó-giām kap thiáu-tsiàn,
iáu-sī pāi tī miâ kiò "Nooh-Pe-luh tsióng" ê kuân tshiûnn tsi-hā.
ū-tang-sî-á siūnn--khí-lâi,
kám-kak lâng tsin sī tsi̍t tsióng nńg-tsiánn ê tōng-bu̍t.
"sí-bông" m̄ sī tsi̍t tsióng pàng-khang tsū-ngóo ê hong-sik,
tian-tò sī uī ka-kī sîng-kong ê bī-lâi thê-tsá tsò kiat-sok.
tong-tāi Ji̍t-pún ti-miâ sió-suat-ka ,
tī i sóo siá ê "khong tsi kíng-kài" tiong,
m̄ tsai ū luā tsē môo-su̍t-su uī-tio̍h thiau-tsiàn koh-khah kuân ê tsân-tshù,
beh tui-kiû íng-sing put sú.
sui-jiân kuè-tîng-tiong hui-siông kan-khóo,
sīm-tsì m̄ bat sîng-kong--kuè,
tān-sī mà bô thiann-kóng in in-uī sit-pāi lâi li-khui sè-kan.
in í-king kā sit-pāi tòng-tsò āu-pái sîng-kong ê ki-huē,
lán khuànn tsit uī tuā bûn-ha̍k-ka,
suah suán-ti̍k kiânn-tsiūnn sí-bông tsit tiâu lōo.
koh hōo ka-kī tsi̍t pái ki-huē--lah!
lâng sī tshiong-buán hi-bāng ê tōng-bu̍t,
kàu tsi̍t ê bô lâng si̍k-sāi ê sóo-tsāi,
tsò tsi̍t piàn lú-hîng,
tse sī "pàng-khang ka-kī" siōng hó ê hong-huat.
tàn-tiāu sóo-ū ak-tsak ê tài-tsì,
hōo sim uân-tsuân tháu-pàng,
bô-tiānn-tio̍h tsit tsō kuân tshiûnn tio̍h ē "put kong tsū phò".
sènn-miā pún sī bû-kè--ê,
hô-pit uī-tio̍h sió-sió ê tshò-tsiat lâi tn̄g-sàng bí-hó ê tsiong-lâi.
phō-tio̍h kám-un ê sim lâi-kàu tsit ê sè-kài,

khah tsia̍h-la̍t --ê koh ē tshiau-kuè gōo-tsa̍p lâng.
